ValidationRule.description: Activation End Date should be greater than or equal to Public Giving Publish End Date.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED(Activation_End_Date__c) ), NOT(ISBLANK(Activation_End_Date__c)), Activation_End_Date__c < Public_Giving_Publish_End_Date__c )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Activation End Date should be greater than or equal to Public Giving Publish End Date
